ygData.subject: Greatings and Salutations....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and well met fellow Wizards of Norrath. This is Eantos the humble leader of The Crafters of the New Vision on the Fennin Ro server. I would just like to
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and well met fellow Wizards of Norrath. This is Eantos the humble
leader of The Crafters of the New Vision on the Fennin Ro server. I would
just like to take this chance to intrudce myself. I am quite a avid fan of
research, and have scoured the lands in search of rare tomes. If anyone know
of certain vendors or adventurers that have these items, please contact me.
My e-mail address is williamb@...
Also, if anyone is interested in joing a guild check out
http://ucsub.colorado.edu/~williamb

Fair well fellow adventurers, jouryney not alone for the lands of Norrath
are not kind to wandering wizards.


-Eantos
